content.rendered:
We completely respect the client’s right to privacy. 

On signing up with our website, or while placing an order we record basic information in order to provide you with a good service experience, up to date information and products as efficiently as possible. When the client contacts us, his/her name, address, telephone number and email address is recorded. 

Your personal information may be used by us to provide information regarding our services and products, for promotional offers and communication purposes in order to provide you with direct healthcare. 

On registration with our site or app, your email address and name will be recorded in order to reply to your inquiries and process the request. Your email may be used by us to forward promotional requests, daily newsletter updates and other marketing materials. You can unsubscribe, change and update your preferences any time. 

We Do Not keep any credit information. We intend to protect your personal data and not use it without your prior consent.   

All clinical information about our clients in terms of dietary facts, medical history, blood reports and health improvement charts shall be kept confidential and secure. 

Our privacy policy is subject to change from time to time, you can visit our website to view the current privacy policy at any time.

@graph.name: Privacy Policy - Echha Joshi
@graph.description: On signing up with our website, or while placing an order we record basic information in order to provide you with a good service experience.Click to read more.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
